files.help:
Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export RXVT_SOCKET="$XDG_RUNTIME_DIR"/urxvtd
```

If the ```$HOME/.urxvt``` folder still shows up, try adding ```RXVT_SOCKET=$XDG_DATA_HOME/urxvtd``` before the ```urxvtd``` command:

```bash
RXVT_SOCKET="$XDG_DATA_HOME"/urxvtd urxvtd -q -o -f
```
If that doesn't work either, try changing ```"$XDG_DATA_HOME"/urxvtd``` to ```/tmp/urxvt-socket```
